Explanation: The documents mention that Ivan Sutherland made a splash on the computer science scene as one of the extremely few students Shannon personally took on, but they do not indicate that Ivan Sutherland was a doctoral student of Claude Shannon. In fact, it is mentioned that Ivan Sutherland's doctoral advisor was Claude Shannon, which means Claude Shannon supervised Ivan Sutherland's Ph.D. thesis.
